statements: SELECT * FROM smart_grid_data;
SELECT data_value, timestamp FROM smart_grid_data;
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM smart_grid_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_data WHERE data_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT data_id, timestamp FROM smart_grid_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_data WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM smart_grid_data WHERE data_value LIKE 'V%';
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_value, timestamp FROM smart_grid_data ORDER BY data_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_id) AS avg_data_id, MAX(data_value) AS max_data_value FROM smart_grid_data;
SELECT user_id, username FROM smart_grid_users;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM smart_grid_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT timestamp, value FROM smart_meter_readings WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM smart_grid_users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT reading_id, timestamp, value FROM smart_meter_readings WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users JOIN smart_meter_readings ON smart_grid_users.user_id = smart_meter_readings.meter_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS count_readings FROM smart_grid_users JOIN smart_meter_readings ON smart_grid_users.user_id = smart_meter_readings.meter_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING count_readings > 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM smart_grid_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_grid_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, event, timestamp FROM smart_grid_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users WHERE username = 'john.doe';
SELECT username, email FROM smart_grid_users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_devices WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_grid_devices WHERE location LIKE '%street%';
SELECT l.timestamp, l.event, u.username FROM smart_grid_logs l JOIN smart_grid_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users;
SELECT username FROM smart_grid_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_access FROM smart_grid_access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM smart_grid_security_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users;
SELECT username, password FROM smart_grid_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, access_time, accessed_table FROM smart_grid_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM smart_grid_permissions WHERE permission_id = 5;
SELECT username, event_type, event_date FROM smart_grid_users u JOIN smart_grid_security_events e ON u.user_id = e.event_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM smart_grid_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM smart_grid_users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM smart_grid_users u INNER JOIN smart_grid_user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN smart_grid_roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN smart_grid_role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN smart_grid_permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_grid_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM smart_grid_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM smart_grid_users u JOIN smart_grid_user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN smart_grid_roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS roles_count FROM smart_grid_users u LEFT JOIN smart_grid_user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username;

SELECT p.permission_name, r.role_name FROM smart_grid_permissions p JOIN smart_grid_role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id JOIN smart_grid_roles r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY r.role_name DESC;
